add_form.title: Add Card
add_form.subtitle: Fill the form below to add a new card

validation_add_card.firstname_min_length: First name must be at least 10 characters
validation_add_card.firstname_max_length: First name must be at most 50 characters
validation_add_card.lastname_min_length: Last name must be at least 10 characters
validation_add_card.lastname_max_length: Last name must be at most 50 characters
validation_add_card.phone_min_length: Phone number must be at least 11 characters
validation_add_card.phone_max_length: Phone number must be at most 11 characters
validation_add_card.cardnumber_min_length: Card number must be at least 16 characters
validation_add_card.cardnumber_max_length: Card number must be at most 16 characters
validation_add_card.breadnumber_length: Bread number must be 5 or a multiple of 5
validation_add_card.min_length_deliveryservice: Delivery service must be at least 15 EGP
validation_add_card.max_length_deliveryservice: Delivery service must be at most 20 EGP
